text.div:
observationPatientSearchParameter

Parameter patient:reference

Searches for observations by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?patient={uuid}

ResourceObservation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesObservation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: observationPatientSearchParameter
description: Searches for observations by a given patient eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?patient={uuid}
